blocks.text: The Xiegu X6100 is an ultra-portable HF/50MHz transceiver using high-performing SDR software radio platform architecture. It features transmit/receive separated dual-channel structure, 24-bit sampling, and a large dynamic RF front-end unit for excellent radio performance.

Power output is 10W with external power supply or 5W on battery. The radio integrates a 4-inch high-resolution color screen (800x480), 3000mAh 12V lithium battery, automatic antenna tuner, standing wave scanner, voice pager, and modem capabilities.

Press and hold the power button to turn on. Press and hold for 1 second to turn off. Long press the Lock button (1s) to lock panel controls; press again to unlock. The indicator light is green when receiving, red when transmitting.
Built-in Bluetooth and WiFi enable wireless audio, keyboard and mouse operation. Integrated USB supports line control and transmission with USB HOST capability.
The X6100 uses button-based menu access: GEN for general settings, KEY for keyer settings, DFN for digital functions, APP for function menu, MSG for messages, and DFL for digital filter.

blocks.name: GEN (General Settings)
blocks.description: Access main radio configuration including handle customization, charging settings, audio levels, and system parameters.

blocks.name: VOL/SQL/RFG Knob
blocks.description: Default: volume control. Press once for squelch depth adjustment. Press again for RF gain adjustment.

blocks.name: MFK (Multi-Function Knob)
blocks.description: Customizable dual-ring knob. Default inner ring adjusts frequency, outer ring can be configured for various functions.

blocks.text: Press KEY to access keyer settings. The KEY port is a 3.5mm stereo interface for manual or automatic keys. For straight keys with 6.5mm 2-core plugs, rewire to 3.5mm stereo with correct Di/Da connections.
Incorrect wiring or direct 2-core to 3-core adapters may keep the radio in CW transmit mode. Cut power before connecting/disconnecting keys. Plugging in while powered may trigger transmission.
The X6100 includes a variable bandwidth digital filter, digital noise reduction, digital notch, and direct decoding of amateur data modes.
Press DFL to access digital filter settings with adjustable bandwidth. Press DFN for digital functions including noise reduction and notch filtering.

The X6100 has a built-in 3000mAh 12V lithium battery providing 5W output. External 13.8V DC power (minimum 3.5A capacity) enables 10W output. Use the supplied power cable and observe correct polarity.
Use the accompanying charging adapter - plug AC into mains and output into DC interface (enable charging in General Settings Menu 1). Full charge takes about 6 hours.
Do not apply AC power or exceed 15V DC. Do not reverse polarity. Store battery at 40-50% charge for long periods. Operating temperature range: -10째C to +55째C.
Press ATU briefly to bring the built-in automatic antenna tuner in-circuit. Long press ATU or press TUNER on the hand microphone to start automatic tuning.
The integrated standing wave scanner helps optimize antenna performance by showing SWR across a frequency range.

blocks.name: Radio overheating
blocks.description: After continuous transmitting (especially FT8), extend transmitting intervals and improve external heat dissipation.

blocks.name: Bluetooth/WiFi issues
blocks.description: Other wireless devices in the same band may cause interference. Move away from other devices or stop using them.

blocks.name: Battery low warnings
blocks.description: Transmit function disables at 7.4V. Radio forces shutdown at 7.2V to protect battery. Recharge promptly.

blocks.name: Stereo headphone issues
blocks.description: The S/P port is stereo - using a mono plug will cause short circuit or silence. Use stereo plugs only.
